data.title: Utah Camping Locations
data.meta_description: Utah Campgrounds and Campsites. Utah has many great KOA locations wherever you are going!
data.text:
Lodging Options at KOA Campgrounds in Utah

One of many reasons to choose KOA is the great variety of camping options. You'll find the perfect sites whether you're looking for tent camping, comfortable cabins or something more unique. The choices you'll find can suit your favorite way to camp, including:

Tent Sites: There's nothing quite like the wild and wonderful experience of traditional tent camping in Utah. It's an unforgettable adventure that maximizes your time under the stars and allows you to encounter all the outdoor beauty of the jewel of the Southwest.

Camping Cabins: If you'd like something a little more comfortable, leave the tent gear at home and choose a Camping Cabin. Not only will you get a bed and a roof over your head, but you'll find that they also come with electricity, beds and other great features.

Deluxe Cabins: Deluxe Cabins at KOA strive to give you all the comforts of home. On top of the features included in a Camping Cabin, our Deluxe Cabins can also provide a private bathroom, and some offer other convenient features like a kitchenette, TV and bed linens.

RV Sites: If you’ll be hitting the road in your RV, you’ll find KOA campgrounds to be your ideal vacation partner. Whatever you need to make your RV experience perfect, you’ll find it at one of KOA RV campgrounds in Utah, including electric/water hookups, 30- and 50-amp service, laundry facilities and more. You can also check out our KOA Patio Sites® for an elevated experience.

Unique lodging options: Many KOA campgrounds offer unique ways to camp. From Glamping Tents and Airstream trailers to cabooses and yurts, each represents an unforgettably unique camping experience. Check with specific KOA campground locations to see what is available!

Not all KOA Campgrounds in Utah provide all of these options, so be sure to check your specific KOA Campground to see what they have to offer.

Benefits of Staying With KOA in Utah

When you set out on a camping adventure with your family, you deserve the best possible experience. That's what you get when you camp at KOA. Not only will you find an affordable camping option in beautiful Utah, but you'll also have access to a team that's committed to providing outstanding customer service to you and all other KOA guests. To make the most of your visit, you can take advantage of great amenities, like:

Laundry facilities

KOA stores

Clean bathrooms with hot water

Playgrounds for young campers

Other features that the whole family will love

Whether it’s hiking, biking or paddle boats, you’ll be able to enjoy nature together at a KOA campground. Many campgrounds also offer great features such as pools and planned activities the whole family will love. No matter the location, campers of all ages are in for some fun and excitement.

Popular Attractions in Utah to Visit

Utah is filled to the brim with exciting adventures and places to explore. Plan a visit to Utah’s famous Bryce and Zion Canyon, and you’ll discover a landscape that belongs in a movie. Visit Lake Powell and experience a desert slot canyon you can boat in. Hike through Moab’s red spires and winding canyons. And you won't want to miss the Great Salt Lake, a state treasure and largest of its kind in the Western Hemisphere.

Wherever you go in Utah, you’ll be in awe of its unending beauty.

If you are looking for a break from the sun, Utah is also home to many museums. Learn about the native voices and the life and land that create Utah's rich and fascinating history at the Natural History Museum of Utah. You might want to explore art from local artists and Artists-in-Residence at the Utah Museum of Contemporary Art as well. Utah also offers plenty of entertainment opportunities for families with the Discovery Gateway Children's Museum or the Clark Planetarium.

After a long day exploring Utah's many attractions, spend your night relaxing and recharging at a KOA. With peaceful and safe campgrounds, you and your family will feel comfortable enjoying time at your campsite or engaging in the many unique amenities your KOA Campground has to offer.

Making a Reservation Is Simple

Utah is a beautiful state with plenty of opportunities for guests to engage with nature or learn more about the region. Whether you are looking for thrills with outdoor recreation activities such as mountain biking or white water rafting or you want to explore the many urban experiences available in Davis County and Salt Lake City, you have endless opportunities to explore when you choose to vacation in Utah.

In between adventures, it is essential to have a home base. With numerous locations across the state, KOA offers access to safe campsites in Utah to allow travelers to rest and recharge before they begin exploring again. Whether you are RV camping in Utah or staying in a Camping Cabin, KOA has something for everyone. By staying at KOA, you will have immediate access to some of the most exciting attractions available. Each campground is also an adventure, with each location offering unique amenities for you and your family to explore.

With 17 KOA options throughout the state, we have the perfect place to start your Utah adventure. Our campgrounds and RV parks in Utah provide the opportunities that allow you to discover a camping experience you won’t find at traditional camping areas in Utah. All you need to do to start your fun is give us a call or reserve your site right here on our website.
